name: groq-vscode
description: Language support for GROQ (Graph-Relational Object Queries) - Sanity's query language

groq.schemaPath.description: Path to the Sanity schema JSON file for schema-aware completions

groq.extensions.paramTypeAnnotations.description: Enable @param {type} $name syntax for typing function parameters. When enabled, provides type-aware completions inside function bodies and warns about unknown types.

groq.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the GROQ language server

scripts.build: npm run build:extension && npm run build:server
scripts.build:server: rm -rf server && mkdir -p server/node_modules && cp -r ../../dist server/ && cp -r ../../node_modules/tree-sitter server/node_modules/ && cp -r ../../node_modules/tree-sitter-groq server/node_modules/ && cp -r ../../node_modules/node-gyp-build server/node_modules/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r ../../node_modules/vscode-languageserver server/node_modules/ && cp -r ../../node_modules/vscode-languageserver-textdocument server/node_modules/ && cp -r ../../node_modules/vscode-languageserver-protocol server/node_modules/ && cp -r ../../node_modules/vscode-languageserver-types server/node_modules/ && cp -r ../../node_modules/vscode-jsonrpc server/node_modules/
